zombiehorsespawn-fabric.duskconfig.title: Zombie Horse Spawn Config
zombiehorsespawn-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_: The chance a zombie that has spawned on the surface is riding a horse.
If enabled, burns zombie horses when daylight shines upon them.
zombiehorsespawn-fabric.duskconfig.shoul: Should Burn Zombie Horses In Daylight
zombiehorsespawn-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_: If enabled, a zombie horse with rider will only spawn on the surface.
zombiehorsespawn-fabric.duskconfig.onlyS: Only Spawn Zombie Horses On Surface
